solrVelocityScriptConfig.name: solrVelocity
solrVelocityScriptConfig.msg: Apache Solr RCE via Velocity template
solrVelocityScriptConfig.subject: please disable sorl velocity template

solrDataImportScriptConfig.name: solrDataImport
solrDataImportScriptConfig.msg: Apache Solr RCE via dataimport url source
solrDataImportScriptConfig.subject: please disable sorl dataimport functions

flinkScriptConfig.name: flink
flinkScriptConfig.msg: Apache Fink any jar File upload and exe
flinkScriptConfig.subject: please disable jar file upload

tomcatAjpScriptConfig.msg: Apache Tomcate AJP Protocal Any File download
tomcatAjpScriptConfig.subject: please reconfig tomcate web config

ms17010ScriptConfig.name: ms17010
ms17010ScriptConfig.msg: smbv1 remote code exe by heep leak!
ms17010ScriptConfig.subject: please patch package,and disable 445,139 ports

bluekeepScriptConfig.name: CVE-2019-0708
bluekeepScriptConfig.msg: BlueKeep (CVE-2019-0708) is a vulnerability in the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP) that can affect the Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows XP, Server 2003 and Server 2008 operating systems!
bluekeepScriptConfig.subject: please patch package,and disable 3389 ports

scanYarnConfig.name: HadoopYarn
